title: LibrarySubView
description: Reusable, non-routable grouping of components intended to be composed into Views or other SubViews. Unlike View, LibrarySubView has no route and cannot be navigated to directly. It exists purely as a reusable composition unit, analogous to an HTML template element.

category.description: Functional category grouping related sub-views within a library (e.g., 'forms', 'data-display', 'navigation', 'feedback').

components.description: Ordered list of ComponentInstance specNodeIds that constitute this reusable sub-view composition.
